Iron =================== Melting: 2011 K Boiling: 3134 K =================== Components per 1 1 Iron ",26:"Description Pg 1 =================== Iron, the most needed Material in Minecraft, unless you have an Iron Titan or something. Nearly every Mod needs it in order to proceed with its Machines. It exists in many Shapes and Forms, such as",27:"Description Pg 2 =================== Compressed Iron, Wrought Iron, Steel, HSLA Steel, Dark Iron, Deep Iron, Meteoric Iron, Conductive Iron, Electrical Steel, Pulsating Iron, Mutated Iron, Shadow Iron, Ironwood and many many more things.",28:"Description Pg 3 =================== It is a very useful Material as it is required to make Steel, the Stuff almost everything Technological is made of. You can also make Wrought Iron, to craft Tools slightly better than Iron Tools.",29:"Description Pg 4 =================== Wrought Iron is created by heating up Iron until 2011 Kelvin to dissolve most unwanted impurities.",30:"Description Pg 5 =================== In order to make Steel you just need to melt Iron or Wrought Iron in a Smelting Crucible and apply Air to it using an Engine."],author:"Material Dictionary Foundation",title:"Iron"}

Iron 1 Air ",26:"Description Pg 1 =================== Wrought Iron, a Material that is worth as much as Iron. It is just a step between Iron itself and Steel, and is just a cleaner Version of Iron. It is also a slightly better Tool Material than Iron.",27:"Description Pg 2 =================== Wrought Iron is created by heating up Iron until 2011 Kelvin to dissolve most unwanted impurities.",28:"Description Pg 3 =================== In order to make Steel you just need to melt Iron or Wrought Iron in a Smelting Crucible and apply Air to it using an Engine."],author:"Material Dictionary Foundation",title:"Wrought Iron"}

Standard Machinery is made of. Cheap, abundant and common, as it only requires Iron and some source of Carbon. There are many different Ways of making Steel supplied by many Mods.",31:"Description Pg 2 =================== In order to make Steel you just need to melt Iron or Wrought Iron in a Smelting Crucible and apply Air to it using an Engine."],author:"Material Dictionary Foundation",title:"Steel"}

",27:"Alloy: Red Alloy =================== Melting: 1400 K Boiling: 2835 K =================== Components per 1 1 Copper 4 Redstone ",28:"Description Pg 1 =================== Copper is a Material, which is needed in almost every electrical Device. But not only that, it is also used to make Bronze, Brass, Cupronickel and some other Alloys.",29:"Description Pg 2 =================== Somehow this Material dissolves Slimey substances and therefore causes severe damage to Slimes and similar Creatures!",30:"Description Pg 3 =================== Annealed Copper is created by heating up Copper until 2800 Kelvin to dissolve most unwanted impurities.",31:"Description Pg 4 =================== The Alloy Signalum can be a little bit hard to produce as you could end up with unwanted Sterling Silver in the Process. To prevent that, insert the Copper last, and always in small amounts at a time."],author:"Material Dictionary Foundation",title:"Copper"}
